scripts.reset: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm package-lock.json
scripts.desenvolvimento: npm run clean && node run/platform.js --platform browser && ng build --configuration=desenvolvimento
scripts.homologacao: npm run clean && node run/platform.js --platform browser && ng build --configuration=homologacao
scripts.producao: npm run clean && node run/platform.js --platform browser && ng build --configuration=producao
scripts.android: node run/platform.js --platform android && ng build --prod --base-href . && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add android && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova build android --release
scripts.ios: node run/platform.js --platform ios && ng build --prod --base-href . && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova platform add ios && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova build ios --release
